name: Slots - Blue Diamond Casino
description:
The #1 PREMIUM Casino Game

Play the best #1 FREE Casino Slot Game here. Welcome to the ultimate winning VEGAS jackpot casino FREE slot experience !! With multiple breathtaking and thrilling slot machines, get FREE coins daily, lots of spin wheel gifts, find your luck queen, huge global jackpot, win huge prices every hour, from Vegas to Atlantic City, come and join the winning league at Blue Diamond Casino - place where WINNERS play.

Join Stacy on a thrilling journey and play the BEST winning slots game :

► Travel through the lush green Mayan jungles for an Adventure hunt !
► Or relive the royal history like an Ancient King !
► Or try your luck in the vast expanse of the Underwater world !
► Or you could bet and win in the famous Vegas experience !

There's no end to fun with the ULTIMATE SLOT MACHINE EXPERIENCE !

We have an awesome collection of slot machine themes to enhance your experience and an exciting array of Mini-Games which can be played to earn coins, awesome rewards, JACKPOT !!

Take your earnings and set out on a quest to become the richest slot machine player the world has known by connecting your game progress with Facebook. Compare and play with your friends and see who comes out on top !

Slots - Blue Diamond features:

► Experience the most happening slot machines of Vegas right here on your device : Adventure Hunt, Underwater, Ancient Kings, Classic Casino and more slot machines added every two weeks !!!
► Place your bets, spin and win awesome rewards.
► Daily login rewards and bonuses.
► Play with your friends and see who is up the leader-board.
► Play more to stand a chance to win the JACKPOT !!
► Never a dull moment when there are awesome Mini-Games to keep you always engaged :
* Hammer smash : Smash the moles and win coins.
* Memory game : Tap and match cards to win coins.
* Locker challenge : Open the locker to win coins.
* Spin the wheel : Tap to spin the lucky wheel and win awesome rewards.
* Box tap : Open boxes to win your luck reward.
* Find the queen : Find you lucky queen trapped between two kings
